section.title: Getting the examples
section.para: Download the drools-examples zip; which is a self contained Eclipse project. The example project in eclipse requires that you have the plugin instilled: import the drools-examples project (it has an eclipse project already setup). The rules all have example classes that execute the rules. If you want to try the examples in another project (or another IDE) then you will need to setup the dependencies by hand of course.
Future documentation will include walk throughs for each of the examples.
